        public Square grabObject​(Player player,
                         Weapon weapon)
                  throws NotEnoughAmmoException,
                         MustDiscardWeaponException
        Method to grab an object from the square
        Parameters:
        player - is the player
        weapon - is the weapon
        Returns:
        the new position of the player
        Throws:
        NotEnoughAmmoException - if the player doesn't have enough ammo
        MustDiscardWeaponException - is the player must discard a weapon before picking a new one

        weapon - is the weapon
        Returns:
        the new player's position
        Throws:
        NotEnoughAmmoException - if the player doesn't have enough ammo
        MustDiscardWeaponException - is the player must discard a weapon before picking a new one
